actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1232.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4370 to provide certain authorities for the Secretary of the Interior to permit rights-of-way for purposes of certain pipeline transportation systems.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4370 (Pipeline systems rights-of-way).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4370 to provide certain authorities for the Secretary of the Interior to permit rights-of-way for purposes of certain pipeline transportation systems.
